thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: New customer
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by New customer

author: New customer
title: New customer
text: I found this site, after my normal site stopped using PayPal. The item w/total cost, turned out to be a little less in price. The item arrived within 3 days and was as shown on site page. Overall pleased with the item ordered, services rendered, quickness of shipping, and ease of using the site page. I've bookmarked this site for future orders.
